013package org.apache.juneau.config;

015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.IOUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;

018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;

022import java.lang.annotation.*;
023import java.lang.reflect.*;
024import java.util.*;
025import java.util.concurrent.atomic.*;

028import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;

042/**
043 * Main configuration API class.
044 *
045 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
046 *    <li class='note'>This class is thread safe and reusable.
047 * </ul>
048 *
049 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
050 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauConfigBasics">Overview &gt; juneau-config</a>
051 * </ul>
052 */
053public final class Config extends Context implements ConfigEventListener {
054
055   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056   // Static
057   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
058
059   private static final boolean DISABLE_AUTO_SYSTEM_PROPS = Boolean.getBoolean("juneau.disableAutoSystemProps");
060   private static final AtomicReference<Config> SYSTEM_DEFAULT = new AtomicReference<>(findSystemDefault());
061
062   /**
063    * Sets a system default configuration.
064    *
065    * @param systemDefault The new system default configuration.
066    */
067   public static synchronized void setSystemDefault(Config systemDefault) {
068      SYSTEM_DEFAULT.set(systemDefault);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Returns the system default configuration.
073    *
074    * @return The system default configuration, or <jk>null</jk> if it doesn't exist.
075    */
076   public static synchronized Config getSystemDefault() {
077      return SYSTEM_DEFAULT.get();
078   }
079
080   private static synchronized Config findSystemDefault() {
081
082      for (var n : getCandidateSystemDefaultConfigNames()) {
083         var config = find(n);
084         if (config != null) {
085            if (! DISABLE_AUTO_SYSTEM_PROPS)
086               config.setSystemProperties();
087            return config;
088         }
089      }
090
091      return null;
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Returns the list of candidate system default configuration file names.
096    *
097    * <p>
098    * If the <js>"juneau.configFile"</js> system property is set, returns a singleton of that value.
099    * <br>Otherwise, returns a list consisting of the following values:
100    * <ol>
101    *    <li>File with same name as jar file but with <js>".cfg"</js> extension.  (e.g. <js>"myjar.cfg"</js>)
102    *    <li>Any file ending in <js>".cfg"</js> in the home directory (names ordered alphabetically).
103    *    <li><js>"juneau.cfg"</js>
104    *    <li><js>"default.cfg"</js>
105    *    <li><js>"application.cfg"</js>
106    *    <li><js>"app.cfg"</js>
107    *    <li><js>"settings.cfg"</js>
108    *    <li><js>"application.properties"</js>
109    * </ol>
110    * <p>
111    *
112    * @return
113    *    A list of candidate file names.
114    *    <br>The returned list is modifiable.
115    *    <br>Each call constructs a new list.
116    */
117   public static synchronized List<String> getCandidateSystemDefaultConfigNames() {
118      var l = listOf(String.class);
119
120      var s = System.getProperty("juneau.configFile");
121      if (s != null) {
122         l.add(s);
123         return l;
124      }
125
126      var cmd = System.getProperty("sun.java.command", "not_found").split("\\s+")[0];
127      if (cmd.endsWith(".jar") && ! cmd.contains("surefirebooter")) {
128         cmd = cmd.replaceAll(".*?([^\\\\\\/]+)\\.jar$", "$1");
129         l.add(cmd + ".cfg");
130         cmd = cmd.replaceAll("[\\.\\_].*$", "");  // Try also without version in jar name.
131         l.add(cmd + ".cfg");
132      }
133
134      var files = sortedSet(new File(".").listFiles());
135      for (var f : files)
136         if (f.getName().endsWith(".cfg"))
137            l.add(f.getName());
138
139      l.add("juneau.cfg");
140      l.add("default.cfg");
141      l.add("application.cfg");
142      l.add("app.cfg");
143      l.add("settings.cfg");
144      l.add("application.properties");
145
146      return l;
147   }
148
149   private static synchronized Config find(String name) {
150      if (name == null)
151         return null;
152      if (FileStore.DEFAULT.exists(name))
153         return Config.create(name).store(FileStore.DEFAULT).build();
154      if (ClasspathStore.DEFAULT.exists(name))
155         return Config.create(name).store(ClasspathStore.DEFAULT).build();
156      return null;
157   }
158
159   /**
160    * Creates a new builder for this object.
161    *
162    * @return A new builder.
163    */
164   public static Builder create() {
165      return new Builder();
166   }
167
168   /**
169    * Same as {@link #create()} but initializes the builder with the specified config name.
170    *
171    * @param name The configuration name.
172    * @return A new builder.
173    */
174   public static Builder create(String name) {
175      return new Builder().name(name);
176   }
177
178   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
179   // Builder
180   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181
182   /**
183    * Builder class.
184    */
185   @FluentSetters
186   public static class Builder extends Context.Builder {
187
188      String name;
189      ConfigStore store;
190      WriterSerializer serializer;
191      ReaderParser parser;
192      Map<Character,Mod> mods;
193      VarResolver varResolver;
194      int binaryLineLength;
195      BinaryFormat binaryFormat;
196      boolean multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines, readOnly;
197
198      /**
199       * Constructor, default settings.
200       */
201      protected Builder() {
202         name = env("Config.name", "Configuration.cfg");
203         store = FileStore.DEFAULT;
204         serializer = Json5Serializer.DEFAULT;
205         parser = JsonParser.DEFAULT;
206         mods = map();
207         mods(XorEncodeMod.INSTANCE);
208         varResolver = VarResolver.DEFAULT;
209         binaryLineLength = env("Config.binaryLineLength", -1);
210         binaryFormat = env("Config.binaryFormat", BinaryFormat.BASE64);
211         multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = env("Config.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines", false);
212         readOnly = env("Config.readOnly", false);
213      }
214
215      /**
216       * Copy constructor.
217       *
218       * @param copyFrom The bean to copy from.
219       */
220      protected Builder(Config copyFrom) {
221         super(copyFrom);
222         name = copyFrom.name;
223         store = copyFrom.store;
224         serializer = copyFrom.serializer;
225         parser = copyFrom.parser;
226         mods = copyOf(copyFrom.mods);
227         varResolver = copyFrom.varResolver;
228         binaryLineLength = copyFrom.binaryLineLength;
229         binaryFormat = copyFrom.binaryFormat;
230         multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = copyFrom.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines;
231         readOnly = copyFrom.readOnly;
232      }
233
234      /**
235       * Copy constructor.
236       *
237       * @param copyFrom The builder to copy from.
238       */
239      protected Builder(Builder copyFrom) {
240         super(copyFrom);
241         name = copyFrom.name;
242         store = copyFrom.store;
243         serializer = copyFrom.serializer;
244         parser = copyFrom.parser;
245         mods = copyOf(copyFrom.mods);
246         varResolver = copyFrom.varResolver;
247         binaryLineLength = copyFrom.binaryLineLength;
248         binaryFormat = copyFrom.binaryFormat;
249         multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = copyFrom.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines;
250         readOnly = copyFrom.readOnly;
251      }
252
253      @Override /* Context.Builder */
254      public Builder copy() {
255         return new Builder(this);
256      }
257
258      @Override /* Context.Builder */
259      public Config build() {
260         return build(Config.class);
261      }
262
263      //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
264      // Properties
265      //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
266
267      /**
268       * Configuration name.
269       *
270       * <p>
271       * Specifies the configuration name.
272       * <br>This is typically the configuration file name, although
273       * the name can be anything identifiable by the {@link ConfigStore} used for retrieving and storing the configuration.
274       *
275       * @param value
276       *    The new value for this property.
277       *    <br>The default is the first value found:
278       *    <ul>
279       *       <li>System property <js>"Config.name"
280       *       <li>Environment variable <js>"CONFIG_NAME"
281       *       <li><js>"Configuration.cfg"</js>
282       *    </ul>
283       * @return This object.
284       */
285      public Builder name(String value) {
286         name = value;
287         return this;
288      }
289
290      /**
291       * Configuration store.
292       *
293       * <p>
294       * The configuration store used for retrieving and storing configurations.
295       *
296       * @param value
297       *    The new value for this property.
298       *    <br>The default is {@link FileStore#DEFAULT}.
299       * @return This object.
300       */
301      public Builder store(ConfigStore value) {
302         store = value;
303         return this;
304      }
305
306      /**
307       * Configuration store.
308       *
309       * <p>
310       * Convenience method for calling <code>store(ConfigMemoryStore.<jsf>DEFAULT</jsf>)</code>.
311       *
312       * @return This object.
313       */
314      public Builder memStore() {
315         store = MemoryStore.DEFAULT;
316         return this;
317      }
318
319      /**
320       * POJO serializer.
321       *
322       * <p>
323       * The serializer to use for serializing POJO values.
324       *
325       * @param value
326       *    The new value for this property.
327       *    <br>The default is {@link Json5Serializer#DEFAULT}
328       * @return This object.
329       */
330      public Builder serializer(WriterSerializer value) {
331         serializer = value;
332         return this;
333      }
334
335      /**
336       * POJO parser.
337       *
338       * <p>
339       * The parser to use for parsing values to POJOs.
340       *
341       * @param value
342       *    The new value for this property.
343       *    <br>The default is {@link JsonParser#DEFAULT}.
344       * @return This object.
345       */
346      public Builder parser(ReaderParser value) {
347         parser = value;
348         return this;
349      }
350
351      /**
352       * Adds a value modifier.
353       *
354       * <p>
355       * Modifiers are used to modify entry value before being persisted.
356       *
357       * @param values
358       *    The mods to apply to this config.
359       * @return This object.
360       */
361      public Builder mods(Mod...values) {
362         for (var value : values)
363            mods.put(value.getId(), value);
364         return this;
365      }
366
367      /**
368       * SVL variable resolver.
369       *
370       * <p>
371       * The resolver to use for resolving SVL variables.
372       *
373       * @param value
374       *    The new value for this property.
375       *    <br>The default is {@link VarResolver#DEFAULT}.
376       * @return This object.
377       */
378      public Builder varResolver(VarResolver value) {
379         varResolver = value;
380         return this;
381      }
382
383      /**
384       * Binary value line length.
385       *
386       * <p>
387       * When serializing binary values, lines will be split after this many characters.
388       * <br>Use <c>-1</c> to represent no line splitting.
389       *
390       * @param value
391       *    The new value for this property.
392       *    <br>The default is the first value found:
393       *    <ul>
394       *       <li>System property <js>"Config.binaryLineLength"
395       *       <li>Environment variable <js>"CONFIG_BINARYLINELENGTH"
396       *       <li><c>-1</c>
397       *    </ul>
398       * @return This object.
399       */
400      public Builder binaryLineLength(int value) {
401         binaryLineLength = value;
402         return this;
403      }
404
405      /**
406       * Binary value format.
407       *
408       * <p>
409       * The format to use when persisting byte arrays.
410       *
411       * <ul class='values'>
412       *    <li>{@link BinaryFormat#BASE64} - BASE64-encoded string.
413       *    <li>{@link BinaryFormat#HEX} - Hexadecimal.
414       *    <li>{@link BinaryFormat#SPACED_HEX} - Hexadecimal with spaces between bytes.
415       * </ul>
416       *
417       * @param value
418       *    The new value for this property.
419       *    <br>The default is the first value found:
420       *    <ul>
421       *       <li>System property <js>"Config.binaryFormat"
422       *       <li>Environment variable <js>"CONFIG_BINARYFORMAT"
423       *       <li>{@link BinaryFormat#BASE64}
424       *    </ul>
425       * @return This object.
426       */
427      public Builder binaryFormat(BinaryFormat value) {
428         binaryFormat = value;
429         return this;
430      }
431
432      /**
433       * Multi-line values on separate lines.
434       *
435       * <p>
436       * When enabled, multi-line values will always be placed on a separate line from the key.
437       *
438       * <p>
439       * The default is the first value found:
440       *    <ul>
441       *       <li>System property <js>"Config.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLine"
442       *       <li>Environment variable <js>"CONFIG_MULTILINEVALUESONSEPARATELINE"
443       *       <li><jk>false</jk>
444       *    </ul>
445       *
446       * @return This object.
447       */
448      public Builder multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines() {
449         multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = true;
450         return this;
451      }
452
453      /**
454       * Read-only mode.
455       *
456       * <p>
457       * When enabled, attempts to call any setters on this object will throw an {@link UnsupportedOperationException}.
458       *
459       * <p>
460       *    The default is the first value found:
461       *    <ul>
462       *       <li>System property <js>"Config.readOnly"
463       *       <li>Environment variable <js>"CONFIG_READONLY"
464       *       <li><jk>false</jk>
465       *    </ul>
466       *
467       * @return This object.
468       */
469      public Builder readOnly() {
470         readOnly = true;
471         return this;
472      }
473
474      // <FluentSetters>
475

477      public Builder annotations(Annotation...values) {
478         super.annotations(values);
479         return this;
480      }
481
482      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
483      public Builder annotations(List<Annotation> values) {
484         super.annotations(values);
485         return this;
486      }
487
488      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
489      public Builder apply(AnnotationWorkList work) {
490         super.apply(work);
491         return this;
492      }
493
494      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
495      public Builder applyAnnotations(Object...from) {
496         super.applyAnnotations(from);
497         return this;
498      }
499
500      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
501      public Builder applyAnnotations(Class<?>...from) {
502         super.applyAnnotations(from);
503         return this;
504      }
505
506      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
507      public Builder cache(Cache<HashKey,? extends org.apache.juneau.Context> value) {
508         super.cache(value);
509         return this;
510      }
511
512      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
513      public Builder debug() {
514         super.debug();
515         return this;
516      }
517
518      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
519      public Builder debug(boolean value) {
520         super.debug(value);
521         return this;
522      }
523
524      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
525      public Builder impl(Context value) {
526         super.impl(value);
527         return this;
528      }
529
530      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder */
531      public Builder type(Class<? extends org.apache.juneau.Context> value) {
532         super.type(value);
533         return this;
534      }

536      // </FluentSetters>
537   }

539   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
540   // Instance
541   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
542
543   final String name;
544   final ConfigStore store;
545   final WriterSerializer serializer;
546   final ReaderParser parser;
547   final Map<Character,Mod> mods;
548   final VarResolver varResolver;
549   final int binaryLineLength;
550   final BinaryFormat binaryFormat;
551   final boolean multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines, readOnly;
552   final BeanSession beanSession;
553   final VarResolverSession varSession;
554
555   private final ConfigMap configMap;
556   private final List<ConfigEventListener> listeners = synced(new LinkedList<>());
557
558
559   @Override /* Context */
560   public Builder copy() {
561      return new Builder(this);
562   }
563
564   /**
565    * Constructor.
566    *
567    * @param builder The builder for this object.
568    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
569    */
570   public Config(Builder builder) throws IOException {
571      super(builder);
572
573      name = builder.name;
574      store = builder.store;
575      configMap = store.getMap(name);
576      configMap.register(this);
577      serializer = builder.serializer;
578      parser = builder.parser;
579      beanSession = parser.getBeanContext().getSession();
580      mods = u(copyOf(builder.mods));
581      varResolver = builder.varResolver;
582      varSession = varResolver
583         .copy()
584         .vars(ConfigVar.class)
585         .bean(Config.class, this)
586         .build()
587         .createSession();
588      binaryLineLength = builder.binaryLineLength;
589      binaryFormat = builder.binaryFormat;
590      multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = builder.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines;
591      readOnly = builder.readOnly;
592   }
593
594   Config(Config copyFrom, VarResolverSession varSession) {
595      super(copyFrom);
596      name = copyFrom.name;
597      store = copyFrom.store;
598      configMap = copyFrom.configMap;
599      configMap.register(this);
600      serializer = copyFrom.serializer;
601      parser = copyFrom.parser;
602      mods = copyFrom.mods;
603      varResolver = copyFrom.varResolver;
604      this.varSession = varSession;
605      binaryLineLength = copyFrom.binaryLineLength;
606      binaryFormat = copyFrom.binaryFormat;
607      multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines = copyFrom.multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines;
608      readOnly = copyFrom.readOnly;
609      beanSession = copyFrom.beanSession;
610   }
611
612   /**
613    * Creates a copy of this config using the specified var session for resolving variables.
614    *
615    * <p>
616    * This creates a shallow copy of the config but replacing the variable resolver.
617    *
618    * @param varSession The var session used for resolving string variables.
619    * @return A new config object.
620    */
621   public Config resolving(VarResolverSession varSession) {
622      return new Config(this, varSession);
623   }
624
625   /**
626    * Returns the name associated with this config (usually a file name).
627    *
628    * @return The name associated with this config, or <jk>null</jk> if it has no name.
629    */
630   public String getName() {
631      return name;
632   }
633
634   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
635   // Workhorse getters
636   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
637
638   /**
639    * Returns the specified value as a string from the config file.
640    *
641    * <p>
642    * Unlike {@link #getString(String)}, this method doesn't replace SVL variables.
643    *
644    * @param key The key.
645    * @return The value, or <jk>null</jk> if the section or value doesn't exist.
646    */
647   private String getRaw(String key) {
648
649      var sname = sname(key);
650      var skey = skey(key);
651
652      var ce = configMap.getEntry(sname, skey);
653
654      if (ce == null)
655         return null;
656
657      return removeMods(ce.getModifiers(), ce.getValue());
658   }
659
660   String applyMods(String mods, String x) {
661      if (mods != null && x != null)
662         for (var i = 0; i < mods.length(); i++)
663            x = getMod(mods.charAt(i)).doApply(x);
664      return x;
665   }
666
667   String removeMods(String mods, String x) {
668      if (mods != null && x != null)
669         for (int i = mods.length()-1; i > -1; i--)
670            x = getMod(mods.charAt(i)).doRemove(x);
671      return x;
672   }
673
674   Mod getMod(char id) {
675      var x = mods.get(id);
676      return x == null ? Mod.NO_OP : x;
677   }
678
679   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
680   // Utility methods
681   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
682
683   /**
684    * Takes the settings defined in this configuration and sets them as system properties.
685    *
686    * @return This object.
687    */
688   public Config setSystemProperties() {
689      for (var section : getSectionNames()) {
690         for (var key : getKeys(section)) {
691            var k = (section.isEmpty() ? key : section + '/' + key);
692            System.setProperty(k, getRaw(k));
693         }
694      }
695      return this;
696   }
697
698   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
699   // Workhorse setters
700   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
701
702   /**
703    * Sets a value in this config.
704    *
705    * @param key The key.
706    * @param value The value.
707    * @return This object.
708    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
709    */
710   public Config set(String key, String value) {
711      checkWrite();
712      Utils.assertArgNotNull("key", key);
713      var sname = sname(key);
714      var skey = skey(key);
715
716      var ce = configMap.getEntry(sname, skey);
717      if (ce == null && value == null)
718         return this;
719
720      var s = applyMods(ce == null ? null : ce.getModifiers(), s(value));
721
722      configMap.setEntry(sname, skey, s, null, null, null);
723      return this;
724   }
725
726   /**
727    * Adds or replaces an entry with the specified key with a POJO serialized to a string using the registered
728    * serializer.
729    *
730    * <p>
731    * Equivalent to calling <c>put(key, value, isEncoded(key))</c>.
732    *
733    * @param key The key.
734    * @param value The new value POJO.
735    * @return The previous value, or <jk>null</jk> if the section or key did not previously exist.
736    * @throws SerializeException
737    *    If serializer could not serialize the value or if a serializer is not registered with this config file.
738    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
739    */
740   public Config set(String key, Object value) throws SerializeException {
741      return set(key, value, null);
742   }
743
744   /**
745    * Same as {@link #set(String, Object)} but allows you to specify the serializer to use to serialize the
746    * value.
747    *
748    * @param key The key.
749    * @param value The new value.
750    * @param serializer
751    *    The serializer to use for serializing the object.
752    *    If <jk>null</jk>, then uses the predefined serializer on the config file.
753    * @return The previous value, or <jk>null</jk> if the section or key did not previously exist.
754    * @throws SerializeException
755    *    If serializer could not serialize the value or if a serializer is not registered with this config file.
756    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
757    */
758   public Config set(String key, Object value, Serializer serializer) throws SerializeException {
759      return set(key, serialize(value, serializer));
760   }
761
762   /**
763    * Same as {@link #set(String, Object)} but allows you to specify all aspects of a value.
764    *
765    * @param key The key.
766    * @param value The new value.
767    * @param serializer
768    *    The serializer to use for serializing the object.
769    *    If <jk>null</jk>, then uses the predefined serializer on the config file.
770    * @param modifiers
771    *    Optional modifiers to apply to the value.
772    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, then previous value will not be replaced.
773    * @param comment
774    *    Optional same-line comment to add to this value.
775    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, then previous value will not be replaced.
776    * @param preLines
777    *    Optional comment or blank lines to add before this entry.
778    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, then previous value will not be replaced.
779    * @return The previous value, or <jk>null</jk> if the section or key did not previously exist.
780    * @throws SerializeException
781    *    If serializer could not serialize the value or if a serializer is not registered with this config file.
782    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
783    */
784   public Config set(String key, Object value, Serializer serializer, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) throws SerializeException {
785      checkWrite();
786      Utils.assertArgNotNull("key", key);
787      var sname = sname(key);
788      var skey = skey(key);
789      modifiers = Utils.nullIfEmpty(modifiers);
790
791      var s = applyMods(modifiers, serialize(value, serializer));
792
793      configMap.setEntry(sname, skey, s, modifiers, comment, preLines);
794      return this;
795   }
796
797   /**
798    * Removes an entry with the specified key.
799    *
800    * @param key The key.
801    * @return The previous value, or <jk>null</jk> if the section or key did not previously exist.
802    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
803    */
804   public Config remove(String key) {
805      checkWrite();
806      var sname = sname(key);
807      var skey = skey(key);
808      configMap.removeEntry(sname, skey);
809      return this;
810   }
811
812   /**
813    * Encodes and unencoded entries in this config.
814    *
815    * <p>
816    * If any entries in the config are marked as encoded but not actually encoded,
817    * this will encode them.
818    *
819    * @return This object.
820    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
821    */
822   public Config applyMods() {
823      checkWrite();
824      for (var section : configMap.getSections()) {
825         for (var key : configMap.getKeys(section)) {
826            var ce = configMap.getEntry(section, key);
827            if (ce.getModifiers() != null) {
828               var mods2 = ce.getModifiers();
829               var value = ce.getValue();
830               for (var i = 0; i < mods2.length(); i++) {
831                  var mod = getMod(mods2.charAt(i));
832                  if (! mod.isApplied(value)) {
833                     configMap.setEntry(section, key, mod.apply(value), null, null, null);
834                  }
835               }
836            }
837         }
838      }
839
840      return this;
841   }
842
843   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
844   // API methods
845   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
846
847   /**
848    * Gets the entry with the specified key.
849    *
850    * <p>
851    * The key can be in one of the following formats...
852    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
853    *    <li>
854    *       <js>"key"</js> - A value in the default section (i.e. defined above any <c>[section]</c> header).
855    *    <li>
856    *       <js>"section/key"</js> - A value from the specified section.
857    * </ul>
858    *
859    * <p>
860    * If entry does not exist, returns an empty {@link Entry} object.
861    *
862    * @param key The key.
863    * @return The entry bean, never <jk>null</jk>.
864    */
865   public Entry get(String key) {
866      return new Entry(this, configMap, sname(key), skey(key));
867   }
868
869   /**
870    * Gets the entry with the specified key.
871    *
872    * <p>
873    * The key can be in one of the following formats...
874    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
875    *    <li>
876    *       <js>"key"</js> - A value in the default section (i.e. defined above any <c>[section]</c> header).
877    *    <li>
878    *       <js>"section/key"</js> - A value from the specified section.
879    * </ul>
880    *
881    * <p>
882    * If entry does not exist, returns <jk>null</jk>.
883    *
884    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
885    *    <li class='note'>This method is equivalent to calling <c>get(<jv>key</jv>).orElse(<jk>null</jk>);</c>.
886    * </ul>
887    *
888    * @param key The key.
889    * @return The entry value, or <jk>null</jk> if it doesn't exist.
890    */
891   public String getString(String key) {
892      return new Entry(this, configMap, sname(key), skey(key)).orElse(null);
893   }
894
895   /**
896    * Gets the section with the specified name.
897    *
898    * <p>
899    * If section does not exist, returns an empty {@link Section} object.
900    *
901    * @param name The section name.  <jk>null</jk> and blank refer to the default section.
902    * @return The section bean, never <jk>null</jk>.
903    */
904   public Section getSection(String name) {
905      return new Section(this, configMap, Utils.emptyIfNull(name));
906   }
907
908   /**
909    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
910    *
911    * @param section
912    *    The section name to write from.
913    *    <br>If empty, refers to the default section.
914    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
915    * @return
916    *    An unmodifiable set of keys, or an empty set if the section doesn't exist.
917    */
918   public Set<String> getKeys(String section) {
919      return configMap.getKeys(section(section));
920   }
921
922   /**
923    * Returns the section names defined in this config.
924    *
925    * @return The section names defined in this config.
926    */
927   public Set<String> getSectionNames() {
928      return u(configMap.getSections());
929   }
930
931   /**
932    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this section contains the specified key and the key has a non-blank value.
933    *
934    * @param key The key.
935    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this section contains the specified key and the key has a non-blank value.
936    */
937   public boolean exists(String key) {
938      return Utils.isNotEmpty(get(key).as(String.class).orElse(null));
939   }
940
941   /**
942    * Creates the specified section if it doesn't exist.
943    *
944    * <p>
945    * Returns the existing section if it already exists.
946    *
947    * @param name
948    *    The section name.
949    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
950    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
951    * @param preLines
952    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the section.
953    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
954    * @return The appended or existing section.
955    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
956    */
957   public Config setSection(String name, List<String> preLines) {
958      try {
959         return setSection(section(name), preLines, null);
960      } catch (SerializeException e) {
961         throw asRuntimeException(e);  // Impossible.
962      }
963   }
964
965   /**
966    * Creates the specified section if it doesn't exist.
967    *
968    * @param name
969    *    The section name.
970    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
971    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
972    * @param preLines
973    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the section.
974    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
975    * @param contents
976    *    Values to set in the new section.
977    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
978    * @return The appended or existing section.
979    * @throws SerializeException Contents could not be serialized.
980    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
981    */
982   public Config setSection(String name, List<String> preLines, Map<String,Object> contents) throws SerializeException {
983      checkWrite();
984      configMap.setSection(section(name), preLines);
985
986      if (contents != null)
987         for (var e : contents.entrySet())
988            set(section(name) + '/' + e.getKey(), e.getValue());
989
990      return this;
991   }
992
993   /**
994    * Removes the section with the specified name.
995    *
996    * @param name The name of the section to remove
997    * @return This object.
998    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
999    */
1000   public Config removeSection(String name) {
1001      checkWrite();
1002      configMap.removeSection(name);
1003      return this;
1004   }
1005
1006   /**
1007    * Creates the specified import statement if it doesn't exist.
1008    *
1009    * @param sectionName
1010    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
1011    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
1012    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
1013    * @param importName
1014    *    The import name.
1015    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
1016    * @param preLines
1017    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the import statement.
1018    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
1019    * @return The appended or existing import statement.
1020    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1021    */
1022   public Config setImport(String sectionName, String importName, List<String> preLines) {
1023      checkWrite();
1024      configMap.setImport(section(name), importName, preLines);
1025      return this;
1026   }
1027
1028   /**
1029    * Removes the import statement with the specified name from the specified section.
1030    *
1031    * @param sectionName
1032    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
1033    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
1034    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
1035    * @param importName
1036    *    The import name.
1037    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
1038    * @return This object.
1039    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1040    */
1041   public Config removeImport(String sectionName, String importName) {
1042      checkWrite();
1043      configMap.removeImport(sectionName, importName);
1044      return this;
1045   }
1046
1047   /**
1048    * Loads the contents of the specified map of maps into this config.
1049    *
1050    * @param m The maps to load.
1051    * @return This object.
1052    * @throws SerializeException Value could not be serialized.
1053    */
1054   public Config load(Map<String,Map<String,Object>> m) throws SerializeException {
1055      if (m != null)
1056         for (var e : m.entrySet()) {
1057            setSection(e.getKey(), null, e.getValue());
1058         }
1059      return this;
1060   }
1061
1062   /**
1063    * Commit the changes in this config to the store.
1064    *
1065    * @return This object.
1066    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
1067    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1068    */
1069   public Config commit() throws IOException {
1070      checkWrite();
1071      configMap.commit();
1072      return this;
1073   }
1074
1075   /**
1076    * Saves this config file to the specified writer as an INI file.
1077    *
1078    * <p>
1079    * The writer will automatically be closed.
1080    *
1081    * @param w The writer to send the output to.
1082    * @return This object.
1083    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred trying to send contents to the writer.
1084    */
1085   public Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
1086      return configMap.writeTo(w);
1087   }
1088
1089   /**
1090    * Add a listener to this config to react to modification events.
1091    *
1092    * <p>
1093    * Listeners should be removed using {@link #removeListener(ConfigEventListener)}.
1094    *
1095    * @param listener The new listener to add.
1096    * @return This object.
1097    */
1098   public synchronized Config addListener(ConfigEventListener listener) {
1099      listeners.add(listener);
1100      return this;
1101   }
1102
1103   /**
1104    * Removes a listener from this config.
1105    *
1106    * @param listener The listener to remove.
1107    * @return This object.
1108    */
1109   public synchronized Config removeListener(ConfigEventListener listener) {
1110      listeners.remove(listener);
1111      return this;
1112   }
1113
1114   /**
1115    * Closes this configuration object by unregistering it from the underlying config map.
1116    */
1117   public void close() {
1118      configMap.unregister(this);
1119   }
1120
1121   /**
1122    * Overwrites the contents of the config file.
1123    *
1124    * @param contents The new contents of the config file.
1125    * @param synchronous Wait until the change has been persisted before returning this map.
1126    * @return This object.
1127    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
1128    * @throws InterruptedException Thread was interrupted.
1129    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1130    */
1131   public Config load(Reader contents, boolean synchronous) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
1132      checkWrite();
1133      configMap.load(read(contents), synchronous);
1134      return this;
1135   }
1136
1137   /**
1138    * Overwrites the contents of the config file.
1139    *
1140    * @param contents The new contents of the config file.
1141    * @param synchronous Wait until the change has been persisted before returning this map.
1142    * @return This object.
1143    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
1144    * @throws InterruptedException Thread was interrupted.
1145    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1146    */
1147   public Config load(String contents, boolean synchronous) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
1148      checkWrite();
1149      configMap.load(contents, synchronous);
1150      return this;
1151   }
1152
1153   /**
1154    * Does a rollback of any changes on this config currently in memory.
1155    *
1156    * @return This object.
1157    * @throws UnsupportedOperationException If configuration is read only.
1158    */
1159   public Config rollback() {
1160      checkWrite();
1161      configMap.rollback();
1162      return this;
1163   }

1165   /**
1166    * Returns the contents of this config as a simple map.
1167    *
1168    * @return The contents of this config as a simple map.
1169    */
1170   public JsonMap toMap() {
1171      return configMap.asMap();
1172   }

1179      return configMap;

1183      return u(listeners);

1186   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1187   // Interface methods
1188   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1189
1190   @Override /* ConfigEventListener */
1191   public synchronized void onConfigChange(ConfigEvents events) {
1192      listeners.forEach(x -> x.onConfigChange(events));
1193   }
1194
1195   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1196   // Private methods
1197   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1198
1199   private String serialize(Object value, Serializer serializer) throws SerializeException {
1200      if (value == null)
1201         return "";
1202      if (serializer == null)
1203         serializer = this.serializer;
1204      var c = value.getClass();
1205      if (value instanceof CharSequence cs)
1206         return nlIfMl(cs);
1207      if (isSimpleType(c))
1208         return value.toString();
1209
1210      if (value instanceof byte[] b) {
1211         String s = null;
1212         if (binaryFormat == BinaryFormat.HEX)
1213            s = toHex(b);
1214         else if (binaryFormat == BinaryFormat.SPACED_HEX)
1215            s = toSpacedHex(b);
1216         else
1217            s = base64Encode(b);
1218         var l = binaryLineLength;
1219         if (l <= 0 || s.length() <= l)
1220            return s;
1221         var sb = new StringBuilder();
1222         for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i += l)
1223            sb.append(binaryLineLength > 0 ? "\n" : "").append(s.substring(i, Math.min(s.length(), i + l)));
1224         return sb.toString();
1225      }
1226
1227      String r = null;
1228      if (multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines)
1229         r = "\n" + (String)serializer.serialize(value);
1230      else
1231         r = (String)serializer.serialize(value);
1232
1233      if (r.startsWith("'"))
1234         return r.substring(1, r.length()-1);
1235      return r;
1236   }
1237
1238   private String nlIfMl(CharSequence cs) {
1239      var s = cs.toString();
1240      if (s.indexOf('\n') != -1 && multiLineValuesOnSeparateLines)
1241         return "\n" + s;
1242      return s;
1243   }
1244
1245   private boolean isSimpleType(Type t) {
1246      if (! (t instanceof Class))
1247         return false;
1248      var c = (Class<?>)t;
1249      return (c == String.class || c.isPrimitive() || c.isAssignableFrom(Number.class) || c == Boolean.class || c.isEnum());
1250   }
1251
1252   private String sname(String key) {
1253      Utils.assertArgNotNull("key", key);
1254      var i = key.indexOf('/');
1255      if (i == -1)
1256         return "";
1257      return key.substring(0, i);
1258   }
1259
1260   private String skey(String key) {
1261      var i = key.indexOf('/');
1262      if (i == -1)
1263         return key;
1264      return key.substring(i+1);
1265   }
1266
1267   private String section(String section) {
1268      Utils.assertArgNotNull("section", section);
1269      if (Utils.isEmpty(section))
1270         return "";
1271      return section;
1272   }
1273
1274   void checkWrite() {
1275      if (readOnly)
1276         throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot call this method on a read-only configuration.");
1277   }
1278
1279   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1280   // Other methods
1281   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1282
1283   @Override /* Object */
1284   public String toString() {
1285      return configMap.toString();
1286   }
1287}
